text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: EC2 Recursive DNS Resolution Issues>
We are investigating DNS resolution issues in a single Availability Zone in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: EC2 Recursive DNS Resolution Issues>
We are investigating DNS resolution issues, increased API error rates, and error rates for new launches in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] EC2 Recursive DNS Resolution Issues>
Between 4:39 PM and 5:50 PM PDT we experienced DNS resolution issues, increased API error rates, and error rates for new launches in the AP-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
